About us 
A Lowcountry Tradition Since 1999

Established in 1999, Vickery’s is a favorite among locals and visitors alike. With wide open views of Shem Creek and the Charleston Harbor, Vickery’s is the Lowcountry’s quintessential, waterfront dining experience! We offer a shaded, outdoor deck, floor to ceiling glass windows for indoor dining, and outdoor picnic tables and seating along the marsh and dockside. Be ready for big plates of Cuban inspired southern favorites, fresh seafood, specialty salads, sandwiches and more. Taste and savor a specialty cocktail or one of our featured wines. If you’re looking for a cold beer, visit our main bar upstairs or the two outdoor bars—Muddy's Dock Bar and the Shark Fin. During the warmer seasons we offer live music at Muddy’s with fun drink specials. Vickery’s is a great place for the entire family, featuring a fun kid’s menu, and leashed dogs are always welcomed at Muddy’s. So welcome everyone! Enjoy everything Vickery's has to offer and be sure to catch some truly amazing sunsets—they never disappoint. We look forward to seeing you on the Creek.

Reviews
Stop reviews carousel Play reviews carousel 
Review by - Google

Leilani E:
five star review by 
I have always loved Vickery's! Loved going here when I lived in Charleston and I will always stop here when I'm in town. It makes me happy the food and quality hasn't changed in the last 20 years!!

Review by - Google

Alisha:
five star review by 
Great food, staff and views. Highly recommend the oyster soup and the 'Le Bombe' dessert. It was delicious! Great ending to paddle boarding for the day.

Review by - Google

Radarius W:
five star review by 
This is the place to go in MT. Pleasant. The restaurant is very beautiful and can accommodate a lot of people. Drinks were good and so was the food.

Review by - Google

jonfit04:
five star review by 
Always a wonderful visit! Great food, fun atmosphere, and excellent service. The views are amazing,!

Review by - Google

Shark M:
five star review by 
We stopped here for lunch on the way to Charleston. FANTASTIC FOOD, FANTASTIC VIEWS! Our meals were made fresh from local seafood. We enjoyed the awesome views of the shrimp boats, pelicans, dolphins, and the coastal vibes. Highly recommended! See pictures of menu and food. LOVED IT!!!
